module.name: associative_text
module.keywords: module, text association, associative text, model annotation

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of annotation texts that are associated with shape elements.

inscope.li: association of presented annotation text with a shape element it documents;

outscope.li: definition of drawings or screen representations;
definition of the context where the annotation texts and shape elements are presented;

uof.name: Associative_text
uof.description: The Associative text UOF specifies the data structure for the representation of an annotation text possibly associated with a shape element it documents.
